short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser for SmugMug galleries and photos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser showing all galleries (organized by folder), photos in galleries you click on, and large photos along with EXIF data. There's also a slideshow.

Version 2.1 adds the Title when you choose to display a caption in a slideshow. Also, it fixes a bug with galleries (albums) that are at the top level (in no folder).

Version 2.0 has lots of internal changes related to using SmugMug's newest API. Visible improvements include a much speedier initial display of folders and an easier-to-navigate list of folders and galleries in a folder. A count of images in a gallery is now shown. A Logout button has been added.

Version 1.5 allows you to set the slideshow interval (5 sec. to 5 min.) and control whether captions appear.

Versions 1.3 and 1.4 fix some bugs related to the slideshow and add some cosmetic features.

Version 1.2 provides a slideshow feature, perfect for setting up a SmugMug Digital Photo Frame. For information on that and more about SmugMugBrowser, go to basepath.com/frame (or click on the Website link just below).
